description: Create a route for an interface.

raw.format_msg: is the command line parameters to create an ip_route entry

to.format_msg: is the destination address IP or the source networking net

interface.format_msg: is the interface used to take out the packet

source.format_msg: is the source address to prefer when sending to the destinations

via.format_msg: is the next hop for the packet

priority.format_msg: the routes with lower value will be more priority
